io.elegie.luchess.app.lucene4x.explore

Class GameListQueryCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.Collector
      • io.elegie.luchess.app.lucene4x.explore.GameListQueryCollector

  • public class GameListQueryCollector
extends org.apache.lucene.search.Collector

    This collector wraps a TopScoreDocCollector, and lets us accumulate data regarding continuations. Continuations were initially stored during indexing, as payload on indexed terms.

    This collector is used with a GameListQuerySimilarity, which gets the payload during the search, and calls the submitContinuation(int, BytesRef) method to transmit it.

      • submitContinuation

        public void submitContinuation(int docID,
                      org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef continuation)
        This method is called by the similarity when a payload has been found. We simply save the payload along with the submitted docID, so that we can retrieve it when the collector starts its collection.
        Parameters:
        docID - The ID of the document, in the current reader's context.
        continuation - The continuation.
